name: hapitest2
description: The second attempt at learning the hapi.js api

scripts.resetdb: npm run unmakedb --silent && npm run makedb --silent && npm run migratedb --silent
scripts.unmakedb: npm run dropdb --silent && npm run droprole --silent
scripts.createrole: psql -d postgres -c "CREATE ROLE %user% WITH PASSWORD '%pass%' NOSUPERUSER NOCREATEDB NOCREATEROLE INHERIT LOGIN"
scripts.makedb: set user=test && set pass=p && set db=testdb && npm run createrole --silent && npm run createdb --silent
